fields.name: Id
fields.description: The id of the gallery artifact version source. Can specify a disk uri, snapshot uri, user image or storage account resource.

fields.name: StorageAccountId
fields.description: The Storage Account Id that contains the vhd blob being used as a source for this artifact version.

fields.name: Uri
fields.description: The uri of the gallery artifact version source. Currently used to specify vhd/blob source.
